articles.title: Microsoft Edge is getting 'Edge for Gamers' mode - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Microsoft is doubling its efforts to court the gaming community with a new feature, "Edge for Gamers" mode, which promises to elevate the user experience inside and outside gaming sessions.
